title: Firewalls
subject: Computer Networks
theory:
A barrier between trusted and untrusted networks. 
- **Packet Filter**: Checks Header (IP/Port). Simple.
- **Stateful**: Tracks connection state (Did I request this?).
- **Application**: Checks payload content (WAF).

interview_questions.question: Can Firewall block Virus?
interview_questions.answer: Not usually (unless it has Deep Packet Inspection). Standard firewalls look at ports, not file contents.
